title: 2008 Six Days Track Cycling Events
text: The 2008 <a href="Six-day%20racing">Six days track cycling</a> events are multi-race competitions, each taking place over six days at various locations in mainland <a href="Europe">Europe</a>. The riders challenge each other in <a href="track%20cycling">track cycling</a> disciplines including the <a href="Madison%20%28cycling%29">madison</a>, <a href="track%20time%20trial">track time trial</a>s, <a href="sprint%20%28cycling%29">sprint</a>s, and <a href="Derny">Derny</a> motor-paced races.
